linksJson.title: What is Money?
linksJson.lead: What defines money and does Bitcoin fit the criteria.

links.title: Money and Politics
links.description: Money is the most universal and most efficient system of mutual trust ever devised.

links.title: Shelling Out: The Origins of Money
links.description: Primitive money was not modern money as we know it.

links.title: What Gave Bitcoin Its Value?
links.description: Why does this magic Internet money have any value at all?

links.title: Yes, Bitcoin Has No Intrinsic Value. Neither Does a $1 Bill
links.description: It’s easy to believe in its value because people have done so for thousands of years, but that doesn’t translate into actual value, only greater trust.

links.title: The Economics of Bitcoin
links.description: Malavika Nair on the economics of Bitcoin.
